Welcome to MindfulHelp

Calm, practical support to help you notice, cope, and find trusted resources

Breathe, explore gentle tips, and take small steps toward feeling steadier today.

Resources

Play in our cafe

Hub of Hope's core purpose is to connect people with relevant support options, from crisis and urgent help services to ongoing peer, community, and specialist provision. The directory lists tens of thousands of services, and organisations can register their details so the database stays current and comprehensive. This makes it useful both for people seeking immediate help and for those looking for longer-term or specialist support.

Learn More

Game library

Explore our collection of board games, ranging from classic favorites to the latest releases. Find the perfect game for any age, skill level, or interest.

See prices in store

Events

Join us for special game nights, tournaments, and themed events. A great opportunity to meet new people and test your gaming skills.

From €5 per person

Kids parties

Celebrate your child's special day with us! We offer fun, game-filled party packages that are sure to delight young gamers and their friends.

From €7 per child
